Filtering by User Locks

Use the Locked By Filter dialog box (View | Filter | Locked By) to view only the versioned files locked by specified users or by any user.

To filter versioned files by user locks:

  1. Select View | Filter | Locked By, or select the Locked By option from the file filter list on the tool bar. The Locked By Filter dialog box appears.

  2. Complete the following fields as needed:

    User option Select this option to display versioned files locked by one or more specific users.
    User field Enter one or more user IDs or browse to select them. Separate multiple user IDs with the delimiter character. The default delimiter is a semicolon (;).

    NOTE Only users listed in the access control database of the current project can be browsed. Users not listed in the access control database could have files locked if the archives were imported from another project. In this case, you must manually enter the user IDs in the field.
    Any user option Select this option to display all locked files regardless of who has them locked.


  3. Click OK.
